test.instr: (:ins (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y airconditioner))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y closet))) (:task (close X) (:cond (type X container))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X airconditioner))) (:info (plate X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X black))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) )
test.nl: Put the book on the airconditioner. Put a can on the closet. Close the containers. Go to the airconditioner. The black book is on the plate. The door of the cupboard is opened.
